example_sentences.example_en: I hurt my arm while playing football.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je me suis blessé le bras en jouant au football.

example_sentences.example_en: She has a tattoo on her leg.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a un tatouage sur sa jambe.

example_sentences.example_en: He nodded his head in agreement.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a hoché la tête en signe d'accord.

example_sentences.example_en: She raised her hand to ask a question.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a levé la main pour poser une question.

example_sentences.example_en: He stepped on my foot by accident.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a marché sur mon pied par accident.

example_sentences.example_en: She has beautiful blue eyes.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a de beaux yeux bleus.

example_sentences.example_en: I have an ear infection.
example_sentences.example_fr: J'ai une infection de l'oreille.

example_sentences.example_en: He opened his mouth to speak.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a ouvert la bouche pour parler.

example_sentences.example_en: She wore a necklace around her neck.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle portait un collier autour du cou.

example_sentences.example_en: He carried the bag on his shoulder.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a porté le sac sur son épaule.

example_sentences.example_en: She has a pain in her back.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a mal au dos.

example_sentences.example_en: He has a tattoo on his chest.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a un tatouage sur la poitrine.

example_sentences.example_en: I have a pain in my stomach.
example_sentences.example_fr: J'ai mal à l'estomac.

example_sentences.example_en: He hurt his knee while playing basketball.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il s'est blessé au genou en jouant au basket-ball.

example_sentences.example_en: She wears a ring on her finger.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle porte une bague à son doigt.

example_sentences.example_en: He stubbed his toe on the door.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il s'est cogné l'orteil contre la porte.

example_sentences.example_en: He gave a thumbs up.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a fait un signe de pouce levé.

example_sentences.example_en: She has a runny nose.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a le nez qui coule.

example_sentences.example_en: He brushes his teeth every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il se brosse les dents chaque matin.

example_sentences.example_en: Her skin is very sensitive.
example_sentences.example_fr: Sa peau est très sensible.

example_sentences.example_en: The heart pumps blood through the body.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le cœur pompe le sang dans le corps.

example_sentences.example_en: The liver helps filter toxins.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le foie aide à filtrer les toxines.

example_sentences.example_en: The lungs are essential for breathing.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les poumons sont essentiels pour respirer.

example_sentences.example_en: The brain controls all body functions.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le cerveau contrôle toutes les fonctions du corps.

example_sentences.example_en: The kidneys filter waste from the blood.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les reins filtrent les déchets du sang.

example_sentences.example_en: The intestines digest food.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les intestins digèrent la nourriture.

example_sentences.example_en: She raised her eyebrows in surprise.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a levé les sourcils de surprise.

example_sentences.example_en: She has long eyelashes.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a de longs cils.

example_sentences.example_en: He applied deodorant to his armpits.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a mis du déodorant sous ses aisselles.

example_sentences.example_en: He twisted his ankle while running.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il s'est tordu la cheville en courant.

example_sentences.example_en: She put her hands on her hips.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a mis ses mains sur ses hanches.

example_sentences.example_en: He wears a watch on his wrist.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il porte une montre à son poignet.

example_sentences.example_en: She placed the coin in her palm.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a placé la pièce dans sa paume.

example_sentences.example_en: Her shoes hurt her heels.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ses chaussures lui font mal aux talons.

example_sentences.example_en: He wiped sweat from his forehead.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a essuyé la sueur de son front.

example_sentences.example_en: He clenched his jaw in anger.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a serré la mâchoire de colère.

example_sentences.example_en: She leaned on her elbow.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle s'est appuyée sur son coude.

example_sentences.example_en: She painted her nails red.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a peint ses ongles en rouge.
